name: enabler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
something or someone that makes it possible for a particular thing to happen or be done: Information technology is an enabler, but not the whole solution.
psychology
  specialized someone who allows or makes it possible for another person to behave in a way that damages that person: He accepts his responsibility as the enabler of many of his wife's problems.
